# <a name="print-an-attachment"></a><span data-ttu-id="91d0c-102">列印附件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-102">Print an attachment</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="91d0c-103">開啟包含您想要列印的附件的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="91d0c-104">將游標移至附件，然後選取 [**更多動作**] 圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="91d0c-105">> **下載**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="91d0c-106">下載檔案之後，開啟與適當的程式，然後選擇 [列印] 選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="91d0c-107">例如，在 Word 中開啟了.doc 檔案，然後列印。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="91d0c-108">如需詳細資訊，請閱讀[列印電子郵件訊息、 附件，並在 Outlook.com 中的行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="91d0c-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
